name: Wordz (Cout Games)
description:
The aim of the game is to try and guess the secret 5-letter word in six tries or less.

Each attempt given should be a valid 5-letter word, but due to performance issues this check is not done. The onus is on the player to be genuine and honest playing the game. :)

To begin, type a word and then press Enter/Return. If you make a mistake, you can press backspace before you submit your word.

After each attempt , the colour of the letter will change in one of three ways:-
Green - right letter, right position
Yellow - right letter, different position
Gray - letter not in word at all

If after six attempts, you have not guessed the secret word, it will be revealed to you.
The game will also keep a track of your game statistics and performance for review.
